item.title: How can i add timers to this?
item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

case 7139://Air Rift
if(actionTimer >= 1){
sendMessage("Give it a fucking chance, shit");
}
else if (playerHasItem(1437)){
sendMessage("You craft some air runes...");
addSkillXP((200*playerLevel[20]), 20);
EssReplace(1437, 556);
setAnimation(791);
actionTimer = 50;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
} else {
sendMessage("You need rune essence to do this!");
}
break;

item.dc:creator: @Fir3_Flam3 Fir3 Flam3
item.description:
@Fir3_Flam3 wrote:

Put an actionTimer (or make a whole new timer if you know how) under the if bit.

if(playerLevel[whatever] >= 60) {
        if(actionTimer == 0) {
*STUFF*
}
}

Sort of like that.
